Text:
De film gaat heel schokkerig en de laatste 20 minuten loopt de film helemaal vast.
Wat kan hier de oorzaak van zijn?
I have the same problem. Film stops in it's last 20 minutes. VLC and media player classic had the same problem.

The end dosen't work. The movie is bad encoded too, so this is not a good download.
Now you know!

I have to say that this is a pretty crappy-looking BDrip. I'm not sure where this was sourced from, but considering there are no other BDrips out there, I would guess that this is an upconverted DVDrip. The actual Blu-Ray comes out August 16th; hopefully some better rips will come along around that time, because this one is just not up to par.
You said it folks. Just got me interested..now I've gotta download another to see the ending.
Movie not complete, missing some 20 minutes from the end...

YOU FUCKING MORONS! THIS IS A DVD RIP UPSCALED (VERY VERY POORLY) TO 1080p!

Actually, the "upscaling" is more like "nearest neighbor resizing", so getting a DVD rip and blowing it up on your HDTV will yield BETTER resolution than this piece of shit.

Fuck you very much for this.
Don't download.  The end is cut off and the frame rate is horrible
